name: RFC Dawn of Civilization
short_description:
Dawn of Civilization is a modmod for the Rhye's and Fall of Civilization mod for Civ4 Beyond the Sword.

It focuses on added replayability by new sets of goals for existing civilizations and the addition of new playable civilizations. These include Korea, Tamils, Byzantium, Tibet, Indonesia, Moors, Poland, Italy, Thailand and Congo.

The mod also strives to both improve on the challenge and gameplay as well as the historical simulation aspect of the game. AI autoplay will now approximate believable outcomes a lot better than in the base mod, without limiting freedom through scripted events.

The mod also includes many AI, interface and game speed enhancements.
summary: A modmod of the Rhye's and Fall of Civilization mod for BtS
